siteMetadata.title: Tigran Hakobyan's personal blog
siteMetadata.subtitle: Long-form thoughts on building software, programming and developer tools.

markdownRemark.html:
The Internet is an incredible medium to connect with people. It’s a place to read the thoughts of the people you admire and can learn from. Here is a list of some interesting people I follow on Twitter.

  • Marc Andreessen
  • Patrick Collison
  • Paul Graham
  • Sam Altman
  • Tyler Cowen
  • Daniel Gross
  • Andy Matuschak
  • Riva Tez
  • Devon Zuegel
  • Nadia Eghbal
  • Nicky Case
  • James Clear
  • Kevin Simler
  • Jeff Dean
  • Paul Krugman
  • Greg Brockman
  • Adam D’Angelo
  • Naval
  • Casey Neistat
  • Tobi Lutke
  • Joel Gascoigne
  • Neha Narkhede
  • Lin Clark
  • Lucy Guo
  • Cindy Sridharan
  • Laura Deming
  • Dan Luu
  • Jackie Luo
  • Mary Rose Cook
  • Kristina Chodorow
  • Gary Bernhardt
